CARDINAL . The relevant provisions of the LAW read as follows :
“ Article CARDINAL The right of a person whose rights are violated by a public authority

( CARDINAL ) A person whose rights are violated by a public authority through an administrative act or through the failure to examine a request within the statutory period , is entitled to obtain the recognition of the right claimed , the annulment of the act and compensation for damage .
( CARDINAL ) The ORG bears pecuniary liability , according to the law , for harm caused through errors committed in criminal proceedings by the investigating authorities and courts . ”

“ Article CARDINAL
( CARDINAL ) In accordance with the present law , individuals and legal entities are entitled to compensation for the moral and pecuniary damage caused as a result of :
